description: The Annual Publication is a proposed program of road and structure projects that are planned for current fiscal year. They are the roadway, spot, structure, engineering, and land acquisition files. The Roadway Layer File is populated by selecting project records containing a Roadway Improvement Type.

name: IDOT Published Annual Program 2011 - Roadway Improvements
